body:
Crossy Road dude just used

bright colors

honestly, that's all there is to it. Your thin is made of "gray and dull red". The crossy shot has bright green and bright blue.

Honestly, that's all you're seeing.

Simply have your model makers use BRIGHT COLORS, and literally turn up the brightness of your lights.

That's all you need.
